title: Paths We've Roamed Before - Traveler Set Card 2 of 9
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Replace "Choose up to 4 total moments or attributes" with Choose up to 4 total moments or attributes not named Paths We've Roamed Before.

Elder's notes: This is a pretty straightforward change that limits the amount of recursion this card can do by simply preventing it from recurring itself. Players can still utilize other cards like Perfect Recall to get this card back and do it all over again, but generally speaking, the more steps in a combo, the safer it is.
